This is the Peer Graded Project for Getting and Cleaning Data. The purpose of this project is to demonstrate ability to collect, work with, and clean a data set.
The data for the project is obtained from the project page in Coursera. The data linked to from the course website represent data collected from the accelerometers from the Samsung Galaxy S smartphone. A full description is available at the site where the data was obtained:

http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Human+Activity+Recognition+Using+Smartphones

Here are the data for the project:

https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip
